t: Jeremiah 9
Oh,*pn that my head were a spring of water and*ld my eyes a fountain of tears! I*ln would weep day and night for*ld the slain of my people.
Oh,*ln that I had in the desert a*ld lodging place for travelers, so*ln that I might leave my people and*ld go away from them; for*ln they are all adulterers, a*ld crowd of unfaithful people.

“They*pn make ready their tongue like*ld a bow, to shoot lies; it*ln is not by truth that*ld they triumph in the land. They*ln go from one sin to another; they*ld do not acknowledge me,” declares*ld the Lord.*s
“Beware*pn of your friends; do*ld not trust anyone in your clan. For*ln every one of them is a deceiver, and*ld every friend a slanderer.
Friend*ln deceives friend, and*ld no one speaks the truth. They*ln have taught their tongues to lie; they*ld weary themselves with sinning.
You*ln live in the midst of deception; in*ld their deceit they refuse to acknowledge me,” declares*ld the Lord.*s
Therefore*p this is what the Lord*s Almighty says: “See,*pn I will refine and test them, for*ld what else can I do because*ld of the sin of my people?
Their*ln tongue is a deadly arrow; it*ld speaks deceitfully. With*ln their mouths they all speak cordially to their neighbors, but*ld in their hearts they set traps for them.
Should*ln I not punish them for this?” declares*ld the Lord.*s “Should*ln I not avenge myself on*ld such a nation as this?”

I*pn will weep and wail for the mountains and*ld take up a lament concerning the wilderness grasslands. They*ln are desolate and untraveled, and*ld the lowing of cattle is not heard. The*ln birds have all fled and*ld the animals are gone.
“I*pn will make Jerusalem a heap of ruins, a*ld haunt of jackals; and*ln I will lay waste the towns of Judah so*ld no one can live there.”
Who*p is wise enough to understand this? Who has been instructed by the Lord*s and can explain it? Why has the land been ruined and laid waste like a desert that no one can cross?
The*p Lord*s said, “It is because they have forsaken my law, which I set before them; they have not obeyed me or followed my law.
Instead, they have followed the stubbornness of their hearts; they have followed the Baals, as their ancestors taught them.”
Therefore this is what the Lord*s Almighty, the God of Israel, says: “See, I will make this people eat bitter food and drink poisoned water.
I will scatter them among nations that neither they nor their ancestors have known, and I will pursue them with the sword until I have made an end of them.”
This*p is what the Lord*s Almighty says: “Consider*pn now! Call for the wailing women to come; send*ld for the most skillful of them.
Let*ln them come quickly and*ld wail over us till*ln our eyes overflow with tears and*ld water streams from our eyelids.
The*ln sound of wailing is heard from Zion: ‘How*ld ruined we are! How*ld great is our shame! We*ln must leave our land because*ld our houses are in ruins.’ ”
Now,*pn you women, hear the word of the Lord;*s open*ld your ears to the words of his mouth. Teach*ln your daughters how to wail; teach*ld one another a lament.
Death*ln has climbed in through our windows and*ld has entered our fortresses; it*ln has removed the children from the streets and*ld the young men from the public squares.
Say,*p “This is what the Lord*s declares: “ ‘Dead*pn bodies will lie like*ld dung on the open field, like*ln cut grain behind the reaper, with*ld no one to gather them.’ ”
This*p is what the Lord*s says: “Let*pn not the wise boast of their wisdom or*ld the strong boast of their strength or*ld the rich boast of their riches,

but*ln let the one who boasts boast about this: that*ld they have the understanding to know me, that*ln I am the Lord,*s who exercises kindness, justice*ld and righteousness on earth, for*ld in these I delight,” declares*ld the Lord.*s
“The*p days are coming,” declares the Lord,*s “when I will punish all who are circumcised only in the flesh—
Egypt, Judah, Edom, Ammon, Moab and all who live in the wilderness in distant places. For all these nations are really uncircumcised, and even the whole house of Israel is uncircumcised in heart.”
